item.description:
Hi All...

Bill has managed to snag a video of beautiful Ireland from a friend of his. We will be showing it on Saturday night, Nov 7th for those that are interested in viewing it. Come see it with us and get a preview of what you will see in just a little over a week from now.

It is beautiful scenery and we would love to share it with all of you. We will have some finger food and a glass of wine along with some fine Irish tunes. This should help to get our holiday off to a great start!

We will also be celebrating Jeanne's birthday that evening. So come join us as we help her to usher in HER new year! HAPPY BIRTHDAY, JEANNE!!!

Anyone who is interested in joining us, whether you are coming to Ireland or not, feel free to do so!

Regards,
Terri
item.how_to_find_us: White house with red brick front...
item.name: Beautiful Ireland!!!
